title: Goldman Sachs’ David Solomon on the Firm’s Performance, the Global Economy and What to Expect in 2022
description: In the latest episode of Exchanges at Goldman Sachs, Goldman Sachs Chairman and CEO David Solomon shares his thoughts on the year ahead and what he expects for the global economy, markets and corporate activity.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
itunes:summary: In the latest episode of Exchanges at Goldman Sachs, Goldman Sachs Chairman and CEO David Solomon shares his thoughts on the year ahead and what he expects for the global economy, markets and corporate activity.
